channel.title: Comments on: Blade’s Edge To Suck Slightly Less!

item.title: By: thingy
item.dc:creator: thingy
item.description: Are they upping the droprate on some quests? That's what made me leave there. Quests that had lots of mobs available, 100% droprate. The rarer the mob you need, the lower the droprate.
item.content:encoded: Are they upping the droprate on some quests? That’s what made me leave there. Quests that had lots of mobs available, 100% droprate. The rarer the mob you need, the lower the droprate.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: Speaking of Blade's Edge... Love me that Toshley's Station! I also love the unusual nature of many of the quests. But all the running around is a pain in the freaking ass.
item.content:encoded: Speaking of Blade’s Edge… Love me that Toshley’s Station! I also love the unusual nature of many of the quests. But all the running around is a pain in the freaking ass.

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description:
Nah. Upon casting it allows you to convert your priest to any of the other classes, at the same level with<strike> similar gear</strike> umm <strike>T0? T1?</strike> ok so the gear wouldnt work.
I can but hope!
item.content:encoded:
Nah.
Upon casting it allows you to convert your priest to any of the other classes, at the same level with similar gear umm T0? T1? ok so the gear wouldnt work.

I can but hope!

item.title: By: Meghara
item.dc:creator: Meghara
item.description: Nope, we're getting a healing pet... it's called a <em>Druid</em>.
item.content:encoded: Nope, we’re getting a healing pet… it’s called a Druid.
